channel.title: Beginner on Cakes By Cassidy
channel.description: Recent content in Beginner on Cakes By Cassidy

item.title: Allergy Free Desserts For Everyone to Enjoy
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } There is nothing worse than going to an event and realizing that you can’t eat any of the desserts because they aren’t gluten free or allergen free. This is something I go through every holiday or occasion. It doesn’t upset me much anymore, but it would be nice to get to a party for once and be greeted by a gluten free cupcake.

item.title: Best Tools for Your Home Bakery
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } Hello again! I am back and I am here to help you start your own home bakery, and what better way to start than to obtain all the necessary tools for your bakery. These will be a good start to any bakery and any speciality you are catering toward. Here are 7 of my recommended kitchen tools. KitchenAid Hand Mixer Pretty self explanatory, but this will save you heaps of time and pain by mixing for you.

item.title: 10 Baking Terms for Beginners
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } I once had a chemistry teacher tell me chemistry is a lot like baking but what they should’ve said is that chemistry is a lot easier than baking! If you’re new to baking, I know what you’re thinking, where do I even begin? I would suggest beginning by learning the basic terminology that more advanced and professional bakers use. This will help you better understand what recipes and tutorials call for as well as leading you to become a better baker.
